SESSION_ID.description: Put your SESSION_ID here. Make sure it starts with KERM-MD-V1~, or get session id from here, https://pair-session-kermv4-pair.onrender.com

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Bot will all status, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

MODE.description: Bot mode can be public, private, inbox or groups in small letters (e.g, public)

ALIVE_IMG.description: paste your image url if you don't have you can use this public url.

AUTO_VOICE.description: Make it true if you want bot auto voice.

AUTO_REPLY.description: Bot will reply to the msgs like gm, gn, love you, hate you, hi, etc... To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

AUTO_REACT.description: Bot will react to the msgs, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

AUTO_STICKER.description: Make it true if you want bot auto sticker.

FAKE_RECORDING.description: Make it true if you want bot fake record.

ANTI_LINK.description: Bot delete or kick links sender from group, To Enable put true and to disable put false (e.g, true)

ALWAYS_ONLINE.description: Keep your WhatsApp always online put true to activate (e.g, true)
